trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of binding elements.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingsSection"></xref> class.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that defines the configuration section that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpsBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpsBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that defines the configuration section that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpsBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingCollectionElement"></xref> instances.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingCollectionElement"></xref> instances.
Gets the configuration section that provides full control over the messaging stack for the user.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CustomBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that contains a collection of custom binding elements.
Gets the configuration setting of a section from the specified configuration file.
A configuration file.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingsSection"></xref> with the settings retrieved from the specified file.
config is `null` or empty.
Gets the specified binding in this configuration section.
The binding to access.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingCollectionElement"></xref> that defines the specified binding in this configuration section.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of MsmqIntegration binding elements.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that contains a collection of MsmqIntegration binding elements.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetHttpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that defines the configuration section that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the net HTTPS binding used.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetHttpsBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that defines the configuration section that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetHttpsBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of netMsmqBinding binding elements.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqBindingCollectionElement"></xref> object that contains a collection of netMsmqBinding binding elements.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetNamedPipeBindingElement"></xref>.objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetNamedPipeBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetNamedPipeBindingElement"></xref>.objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of netPeerTcpBinding elements.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetPeerTcpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetPeerTcpBindingElement"></xref> elements.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007FederationHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
The configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007FederationHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
The configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSFederationHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSFederationHttpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSFederationHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
Gets the configuration element that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingCollectionElement"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref> objects.
